tool_description: Creates and manages product variants by generating combinations of attributes like size, color, and material with individual pricing and inventory.

base_product_id.description: Identifier of the base product for variant creation

variant_attributes.description: Attribute types for variants (e.g., size, color, material)

attribute_values.description: Possible values for each attribute in order

pricing_strategy.description: Variant pricing approach: uniform, tiered, or custom

inventory_tracking.description: Enable individual inventory tracking for each variant

error_messages: Invalid base product: base_product_id must reference an existing product
Insufficient variant data: Provide at least one attribute and two values
Invalid pricing strategy: Use one of [uniform, tiered, custom]
Attribute value mismatch: Number of attribute_values must correspond to variant_attributes
usage: Specify base_product_id, variant_attributes, and corresponding attribute_values; optionally set pricing_strategy and inventory_tracking for variant management preferences.

created_variants.description: Number of product variants successfully created

variant_skus.description: Generated SKUs for each created variant

total_permutations.description: Total possible combinations from provided attributes
